area.title: New Mediums for Discourse
area.description: The systems we use for online discussion have changed little from the early mediums of forums, chat, and bulletin boards. But these designs bake in many assumptions about discussion that limit our capabilities for collaboration and that also lead to problems. How can we design new mediums for online discourse that make it easier to listen, share, and create?

area.title: Community Resilience and Self-Governance
area.description: Online communities have grown to fill an important part of people's everyday lives. Yet the tools that online communities have to shape their own norms and rules are limited, resulting in top-down governance structures that easily fall apart or lead people to burn out. We design democratic structures to support community resilience as well as tools for self-governance.
